text: Blinken Open Society Archives (Blinken OSA) is an archival institution in Hungary. == Introduction == It was founded by George Soros in 1995, and opened in 1996 as a department of the Central European University. Originally called Open Society Archives (OSA), in 2015 it was renamed Vera and Donald Blinken Open Society Archives. Its archives are related to post-war European history, the Cold War, the history of the former Eastern Bloc, samizdat, the history of propaganda, human rights, and war crimes. Blinken OSA is also a department of the Central European University. The institution is located in Budapest. The building now also has a gallery named Galeria Centralis. ==References== Category:Central European University Category:Organizations based in Hungary
title: Blinken Open Society Archives
